metadata.title: CVE-2023-45857 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue discovered in Axios 1.5.1 inadvertently reveals the confidentialXSRF-TOKEN stored in cookies by including it in the HTTP headerX-XSRF-TOKEN for every request made to any host allowing attackers to viewsensitive information.

criterions.comment: node-axios package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
